price: “Evo zašto: dokazi Naši su ti dolazili, ali si ih zaboravljao, pa ćeš danas ti isto tako biti zaboravljen”, reći će On.
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla kadhālika atatka āyātunā fanasītahā wakadhālika al-yawma tunsā
